cs524.controlsystem

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs524.controlsystem.Agent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    cs524.controlsystem.I_Updateable

    public class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
implements cs524.controlsystem.I_Updateable
    Defines an arbitrary physical agent (assumed to be a boat in CS 524 Task 3) in two-dimensional space. It starts at a position with an azimuth and speed. From there, only putative rudder can be controlled, which then changes the azimuth per update. The new position is based on the change in position from the old position with respect to the current speed and azimuth. Do not change this file.
    Author:
    Dan Tappan [22.04.14]

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double _azimuth
      the current azimuth of the agent
      private double _azimuthDelta
      the current signed angle on [-AZIMUTH_DELTA_LIMIT,+AZIMUTH_DELTA_LIMIT] by which the azimuth changes per update
      private double _azimuthDeltaTarget
      the desired signed angle on [-AZIMUTH_DELTA_LIMIT,+AZIMUTH_DELTA_LIMIT] by which the azimuth changes per update
      private boolean _isDeflectionInstantaneous
      whether deflection to a new azimuth delta is instantaneous, otherwise incremental
      private double _speed
      the current speed of the agent
      private double _x
      the x position of the agent
      private double _y
      the y position of the agent
      private static double AZIMUTH_DELTA_DELTA
      for noninstantaneous deflection, the current azimuth updates toward the target azimuth by this value once per update
      private static double AZIMUTH_DELTA_LIMIT
      the positive and negative limit to azimuth delta
      private static double CIRCLE_DEGREES
      the degrees in a circle
      private static double EPSILON
      the plus/minus band for accepting that the current azimuth has reached the target azimuth

      • setAzimuthDeltaTarget

        public void setAzimuthDeltaTarget(double azimuthDelta)
        Sets the desired signed angle on [-AZIMUTH_DELTA_LIMIT,+AZIMUTH_DELTA_LIMIT] by which the azimuth changes per update. If the deflection mode is instantaneous, then this angle is achieved immediately; otherwise, the current angle updates toward the desired angle by AZIMUTH_DELTA_DELTA.
        Parameters:
        azimuthDelta - - the angle
